K

KeyHandler - Interface in fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI
The KeyHandler which will be called by the Arena in case of key events such as key pressed, released or typed
KeyListener - Class in simpleUIApp.Controller
The keyListner class.
KeyListener(JFrame) - Constructor for class simpleUIApp.Controller.KeyListener
The keyListener constructor.
KeyPress - Enum in fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI
Handled key pressed during a mouse event
keyPressed(char) - Method in interface fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.KeyHandler
keyPressed is called when a key is pressed.
keyPressed(char) - Method in class simpleUIApp.Controller.KeyListener
The implemented method of KeyHandler.
keyReleased(char) - Method in interface fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.KeyHandler
keyReleased is called when a key is released.
keyReleased(char) - Method in class simpleUIApp.Controller.KeyListener
The implemented method of KeyHandler.
keyTyped(char) - Method in interface fr.ubordeaux.simpleUI.KeyHandler
keyTyped is called when a key has been typed.
